All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BackgroundTile
Holds image for the background tile.
BonusTreasure
Bonus Treasure will randomly appear and disappear on the map.
BonusTreasureClock
This clock is to be used with BonusTreasure.
Character
Contains methods that are applicable to all npc and human players.
CharacterMovementThread
Allows the character to move 1 space at a time.
CharacterType
Specifies if the character is an enemy or main player.
Constants
Contains all constants for the project.
CreateBackground
] Creates the background grid using background tiles.
Direction
Contains all possible directions a character can face on the map.
ExitCell
Cell which player exits the game through.
Grid
The grid represents the layout of the map.
Item
Contains methods that are applicable to all items.
ItemDetection
When the player steps on an item, it should disappear and award the player points based on the item.
Keyboard
IO.Keyboard listens for keyboard input from the user.
Level
Contains all level data for a particular map.
Main
 
Obstacle
Characters cannot walk through obstacles on the map.
PlayerActor
This PlayerActor refers to the main character controlled by the user.
RandomSoundClock
The game will play a random sound.
Skeleton
The skeleton enemy will follow the main character.
Sound
Holds all sound functions for the project.
TickClock
Every Character should move at the same time according to this tick clock.
Timer
The timer keeps incrementing time every 10 milliseconds.
Trap
If the play steps on a trap they will receive damage.
TrapClock
The trap should only hurt the player periodically.
Treasure
When a player reaches a reward on the map, they will receive extra points when they walk over the treasure.
UI
Contains all UI functions for the project.
Zombie
The zombie enemy runs in straight lines.
